verses.text: They that \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add shall be\add* as \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, \add which\add* cannot be \w removed|strong="H4131"\w*, \add but\add* \w abideth|strong="H3427"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

As the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \add are\add* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, so the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* his \w people|strong="H5971"\w* from henceforth even \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

For the \w rod|strong="H7626"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7562"\w* shall not \w rest|strong="H5117"\w* upon the \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* of the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*; \w lest|strong="H4616"\w* the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* put \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* unto \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w*.\f + \fr 125.3 \ft the wicked: Heb. wickedness\f*

Do \w good|strong="H2895"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, unto \add those that be\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, and \add to them that are\add* \w upright|strong="H3477"\w* in their \w hearts|strong="H3826"\w*.

As for such as turn \w aside|strong="H5186"\w* unto their crooked \w ways|strong="H6128"\w*, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall lead them \w forth|strong="H3212"\w* with the \w workers|strong="H6466"\w* of \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w*: \add but\add* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \add shall be\add* upon \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.
